title: The Last Directive
story_summary: The city wakes to shocking feeds showing how BCI once shaped every life in secret. People gather in the streets to share their stories and demand answers. In the end, Stenograd votes for its future and chooses whether to reveal everything or leave the BCI era behind.

official.headline: Open Assemblies Form
official.anchor_line: Citizens gather peacefully to discuss recent policy adjustments across the city.
official.contextual_reframing: Community dialogue demonstrates Stenograd's capacity for rational, transparent conversation in periods of change.

official.headline: Citywide Vote Held
official.anchor_line: Stenograd proceeds with a binding citywide vote to determine new principles for leadership and transparency.
official.contextual_reframing: The seamless organization of this decisive vote reflects our commitment to efficient civic solutions and shared progress.

official.headline: System Insights Revealed
official.anchor_line: Residents receive detailed records on prior system interventions, promoting collective awareness and resilience.
official.contextual_reframing: Open access to personal system histories ensures an informed citizenry, supporting our city's responsible future governance.

underground.headline: Council Scrambles
underground.anchor_line: Council elites panic as secret protocols rip through the polished calm of Stenograd.
underground.contextual_reframing: No more silent compliance. The cracks in the system are now visible to all. Even the controllers have lost control.

underground.headline: Whispers Turn Loud
underground.anchor_line: Streets buzz with confessions as neighbors compare how the BCI quietly rewrote their lives.
underground.contextual_reframing: Behind every cold metric was a stolen choice. People finally have a chance to speak for themselves.

underground.headline: Truth Unleashed
underground.anchor_line: Every citizen sees when and how their life was secretly steered by algorithms and silent hands.
underground.contextual_reframing: We live in the shadow of every denied path. Now, everyone can trace the scars. This is where Stenograd reckons with its future.
